Posts.Content: Sorry chat down, but am to help. Going on the 6th year here of breast cancer free in PR. So Lucky. Cindy
Posts.Title: How is everyone.

Posts.Content: Hey, I am Cindy from Puerto Rico, and have gone through it, not as bad as you have. Had Breast Cancer in both breasts, and the chemo and ratio. We are from Calif. but with military here in PR. If I can be of any help, with support let me know. I know what you are going through. Go through that last bone scan, please be positive, as I have been there, as crying will not do any good, as living in PR you have the different culture, and have to be positive. Hubby, is the best, listen to him. as said the doc's know. Cindy
Posts.Title: Good news/ bad news
